message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $120 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $90, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a great product, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
